attributes.action: restore democratic government of the UK to Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The fate of the UK is being decided by the Prime Minister and not the MP's, democratically elected by the people.
Power must be returned to Parliament and the throng of unelected Peers and rich cronies put back out to grass.
We are a Democracy and not a Republic.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
